data.text: @danaimmanuel Hi Dana, did you manage to fill the form in via the desktop version? Kind regards, Lyndsay

domain.name: Cities
domain.description: Cities around the world

data.text: @Wortlooser Hi, leider gibt es in Berlin ein ziemliches Backlog und es kommt zu Verzögerungen bei der Auslieferung auch wenn das Gepäck schon angekommen ist. Die KollegInnen in Berlin werden sich so schnell wie möglich bei dir melden. Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay
@ImTracyWard Hi there, please send us the reference number of your claim (XXXX-OS-XXXXX) in a DM so we can investigate further. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @heri5ca Hi there, we apologize for any inconvenience. If you have not sent your request via our online form so far please do so here https://t.co/DlPk2wk146 If you have been in touch with our colleagues already, please reply directly back to them via mail. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@Hazelfarm Hi Damon, we are sorry to hear about your experience and can only apologize for any inconvenience caused. If you haven't sent your feedback yet to Customer Relations, please do so via
https://t.co/KvLtbwEr8U Kind regards, Chris
@danaimmanuel Hi Dana, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please use the desktop version of our homepage to send the mentioned online form. Kind regards, Chris
@AnnaS100 Hi Anna, we are sorry to hear about your experience. If you have not been rebooked in the meantime please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@Wortlooser Hi Henrik, du kannst den Status deines Gepäcks jederzeit online prüfen https://t.co/obEPeuGdKM Bitte sei versichert, dass unsere KollegInnen in vollem Einsatz sind um alle Koffer schnellstmöglich zu ihren Besitzern zurückzubringen. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @danaimmanuel Hi, we're sorry to hear of any payment issues you've experienced. Please fill in our online form yo that our accountancy department can look into the matter: https://t.co/1TY2Rg5cdZ Kind regards, Lyndsay

@nieszprot Hi, our colleagues will reply to you as soon as possible. They are confronted with a high amount of requests at the moment and this makes it difficult for them to keep the usual average responding time. We apologize for the delay. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@alanhamlett Hi, this message is generally when passport/visa has to be verified by ground staff. Please send us your booking code via PM and we can double check for you. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@Wortlooser Hi, es tut uns sehr leid, dass es während deiner Reise zu diesen Unannehmlichkeiten gekommen ist. Bitte wende dich an den Kontakt, der auf dem Property Irregularity Report (PIR) zu finden ist. Den PIR hast du am Lost&Found Schalter bekommen. Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay

@lorikrussell Hello Lori, please mind that the off and onload process of the luggage is not handled by Austrian Airlines itself but from a contracted handling agent. So we are depending on a reliable way of work and the compliance of our strict quality standards by our contractual partner.

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @ImportWithEase Hi, we're sorry for the inconvenience. If you could't clarify this issue in the meantime then please fill out our online form via https://t.co/FFefe6Jqyt. Please choose booking/refund/invoice and then internet booking so that our colleagues can assist further. Best regards,Susi
@aesthetic_edge Hi, sorry to read this. Get in touch if there's ever anything we can do to help. Best regards, Susi
@r8lobster Hi, you'll be contacted as soon as your baggage is ready for delivery. In the meantime, I kindly ask for your continued patience. Best regards, Susi

@ImTracyWard Hi, we're very sorry for any inconvenience concerning your request. Thank you for your patience until now. We kindly ask you to give our colleagues more time as they try to accomplish every case individually. Best regards, Susi

@WeibsBlog Hi, entschuldige bitte meine späte Antwort. Es tut mir leid zu hören, dass du bei unserer Service Hotline nicht durchgekommen bist. Wir haben aktuell enorm viele Anrufe. Konntest du dein Web Check-in Problem bereits lösen? Liebe Grüße, Sandra

@B3EXECS Dear Roger,
I really do understand your frustration, and while I cannot give you a precise timeline as to when your claim will be processed, I can assure you that the team is working hard to get back to you as soon as possible. 
Best regards
Alessandra

@abdullatif_aydn @eaes_eu Hi there, sorry for any inconvenience caused. Your case was received by our colleagues, but the answer might take a while due to the current situation. Please be assured that all requests will be answered as fast as possible. Kind regards, Petra
@natasha_jane18 Hi Natasha, please send us your file reference from Feedback Management in a DM and we will have a closer look. Kind regards, Funda
@bentleybrowning @AustrianAirScam Hi there, please send us the file reference and we will have a closer look. Kind regards, Funda

@chrisoslatt @UnitedAirlines_ Hello,
we are unable to assist with baggage cases, we kindly ask you to stay in touch with the number on your Lost Report for any updates. You may alternatively check the current status online here:
https://t.co/hrzpeJ2Zxa
Best regards
Alessandra

data.text: @iiref15 Hi there, we replied to your message via Facebook already. Kind regards, Funda
@carinaround Hi Carina, I am very sorry to learn that. We replied to your DM already. Kind regards, Funda

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @abdullatif_aydn @EAES_eu Hi Abdulllatif, we are really sorry to learn that. Did you already filled out our online webform? Please send us the file reference? Otherwise please fill out the form via this link: https://t.co/nI9NK7dWfW . Kind regards, Funda

@marcdeb Hello Marc,
are you trying to check in?
Please send us the details in a DM. 
We'll try to help.
Kind regards
Alessandra

data.text: @nikolausf I really do understand your frustration, and while I cannot give you a precise timeline as to when your claim will be processed, I can assure you that the team is working hard to get back to you as soon as possible. We really do appreciate your patience, so please bear with us.

@celinespithoven  Hi Celine, We are sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. As the last operating carrier on your journey was Thai Smile Airways, please contact them regarding your case. Thank you and kind regards, Petra

@tuxford_jacob Hi Jacob, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@Sandee9378 Hi Sandra, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. If your baggage has been missing for more than 5 days, please send the following form via vielzos@austrian.com https://t.co/YvYTtEUEyK Kind regards, Chris

@sandee9378 Hello Sandra,
we are unable to assist with baggage cases, we kindly ask you to stay in touch with the number on your Lost Report for any updates. You may alternatively check the current status online here
https://t.co/hrzpeJ2Zxa
Best regards
Alessandra

@blolop_ Hello, please, be aware that due to high volumes the reply may take longer. Rest assured that my colleagues of Customer Care handle each case individually and carefully. I appreciate your patience in the meantime. Best regards
Alessandra
@CdcTraffic Hi there, please send us via PM the e-mail address from which your complaint was sent so we can pass it on to our colleagues with a note of urgency. Best regards, Denis

@marsadle Hi Markus, unfortunately, we can't give you an estimate. Each case is handled individually and according to internal guidelines. Hence, I can only ask you for a little bit more patience. Best regards, Denis

data.text: @mtsullivn [2/3]Unfortunately, there is currently a considerable backlog which is why it is taking longer than normal. Our respective colleagues will provide you with an update as soon as they have further information.

@mtsullivn [1/3] Hi Mike, 
I'm sorry that we are unable to provide you with an immediate solution. Please be assured that our colleagues are fully aware that people need their luggage and are working around the clock to process each bag and reunite passengers with their luggage.

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @DittmarMittner Hi Dittmar, wir entschuldigen uns für die entstandenen Unannehmlichkeiten. Solltest du deinen Fall noch nicht an unser Feedback Management geschickt haben, bitte mach das unter folgendem Link: https://t.co/DlPk2wk146  Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@yakoubi_rihab Hi Rihab, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@mtsullivn Hi Mike, I am sorry to hear about your delayed baggage. Have you filed a claim at the airport? If yes, you should have received a PIR-Number which will allow you to trace your baggage via the following link: https://t.co/KcfvjdaS6A
Best regards, Denis

data.text: @miglen @SOFIAirport Hi Miglen, we're sorry to hear that you have experienced this. As you have already submitted the respective forms, our colleagues will review this and will get to you as soon as possible. Nevertheless, we hope that you have reached your destination safely. Kind regards, Daphne

urls.title: Entry into Austria and pre-travel clearance
urls.description: The COVID-19- Einreiseverordnung 2022 (COVID-19 Entry Regulation 2022) regulates entry from states and territories with a very high epidemiological risk into Austria. The states and territories concerned are listed in Appendix 1 of the regulation, but none are listed at the current moment. There are no restricti ons on entry from other states and territories. Entry from states and territories not listed in Appendix 1 of the Entry Regulation is no longer subject to 3G (proof of vaccination, recovery or a

data.text: @talesXpress @IndiainAustria @MFA_Austria Hi, please check here for the current covid entry requirements: https://t.co/de1B7kPGZE Kind regards, Lyndsay

@sarahwhitty88 Hi Sarah, we’re sincerely sorry that your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, we've no access to any luggage claims. When you reported your missing bag you must've received a Property Irregularity Report with a contact to reach for updates. Please refer to this contact.
@Littlbanker Hi, we replied to your PM. Kind regards, Lyndsay

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @fkabadayi Hi, we apologize your luggage hasn't been delivered yet. Claims can be submitted by the following link: https://t.co/rXJ4j9VHYR Kind regards, Lyndsay

@roxanescu Hi there, your inquiry is already forwarded to the responsible department. We're sorry that you've been waiting already for so long. Our colleagues are doing their utmost to answer each inquiry as soon as possible. We kindly ask for your patience. Kind regards, Daphne
@sariyahidan Hi, our colleagues will respond. However, due to the high number of inquiries they cannot keep to their normal response times. We apologize for the delay. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@q_e_dubitandum Liebe Leni, es tut mir wirklich leid, dass du negative Erfahrungen auf unserem Flug gehabt hast. Liebe Grüße, Funda
@roxanescu Hi, please send us the claim reference number or email ID and we can check it has been received correctly. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@Pebbles_Ang @eurowings Hi, please send us the email ID via PM. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@roxanescu Hi Roxana, unfortunately, we can't give you an estimate. Each case is handled individually and according to internal guidelines. Thank you for your patience.
Best regards, Denis

data.text: @zuck65 @duzdanisaq @austriainuk Hi there, we apologize for the delay to your luggage. Once your bag has arrived in Berlin our colleagues will be in touch. They are doing their best to process each bag as quickly as possible to get it to its destination. Best regards, Denis
@BenJWeinberg Hi Ben, please send us your booking code, and we will take a closer look. Best regards, Denis

@PappersV [2/2] But you can be assured that it's our top priority to guarantee our guests a comfortable travel experience may it be before your flight, during, or after. I'd totally grab the tickets to Bangkok but I might be a little bit biased. ;) Best regards, Sandra

data.text: @PappersV [1/2] True our and other airlines' reviews are probably not the best at the moment as there were some turbulent weeks during summer due to the current situation in the airline industry (e.g. shortages, adverse weather conditions, technical problems in the baggage handling areas).

data.text: @BillX Hi, es tut uns leid, dass es während deiner Reise zu Unannehmlichkeiten gekommen ist. Solltest du deinen Fall noch nicht an unser Feedback Management geschickt haben, bitte mach das unter folgendem Link: https://t.co/O5n3NuTvkn  Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@mtjwatts Hi Matt, we are sorry to hear that you were affected by a cancellation and we apologize for any inconvenience caused. If you have not been rebooked in the meantime, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@katharine_weir Hi Katharine, We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Due to the current situation, the processing can take longer than usual. However, please send us the reference number of the claim (XXXX-OS-XXXXX) in a DM so we can investigate further. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text: @Pebbles_Ang Hi there, Please contact our colleagues via the following form regarding a possible refund: https://t.co/QI0fSSoknS Due to the high amount of requests we receive at the moment we ask for your understanding that the response can take longer than usual. Kind regards, Chris
@Proxxster Hallo Proxster, bitte nenn uns deine Buchungsreferenz, dann helfen wir gerne weiter. Liebe Grüße, Denis

@stevengothard Hi Steven, how may we assist you?
Best regards, Gayle

@iiref15 Hi there, We are sorry for any frustration caused by the length of time taken to solve your issue. Due to the high amount of requests we receive at the moment, the response can take longer than usual. Please be assured that all requests are being answered. Kind regards, Chris
@Gradsen Hi AJ, please be informed that the baggage does not have to be checked in again during your transit. You will only need to take it through customs. Kind regards, Chris

@furbyservices Hello,
thank you for your feedback.
Let me know if you need assistance with the rebooking.
Best regards
Alessandra

es tut uns leid, dass dein Gepäck nicht angekommen ist. Unser Social Media Team hat keinen Zugang in das Gepäcksystem. Bitte wende dich weiterhin an den Kontakt, der auf dem Property Irregularity Report (PIR) zu finden ist.

data.text: @DinaSal56424611 Hi Dina, we're sorry to hear about this. Please report this by following the procedure on our website under the question What should I do if I do not notice damage and/or missing items until after I have left the airport? https://t.co/Ijw5CsLWdU Kind regards, Lyndsay

@pichsenmeister Hallo David,
Wenn wir Dein Gepäck nicht innerhalb von fünf Tagen finden, sende bitte das ausgefüllte Baggage Questionnaire Formular an vielzos@austrian.com.
Hier der Link dazu:
https://t.co/o3XIOQmXHr
Liebe Grüße

data.text: @PeelyPeelyb Hi there, We are sorry for any frustration caused by the length of time taken to solve your issue. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to the baggage system. Please get in touch with our colleagues via the following form https://t.co/DlPk2wk146 Kind regards, Chris

@boramaapps Hi there, if you have not been able to complete the booking in the meantime and are still facing difficulties when trying to book via a third party (e.g. Expedia), we can only ask you to contact their support team or you can book on our website directly. Kind regards, Chris

we are sorry for the inconvenience.

data.text: #Servus OE-LZN 👋🏼 Today we welcomed our first #A320neo in Vienna ✈️ In the upcoming weeks our newest fleet member will be prepared for the first commercial flight. Three more of these world’s most efficient short- and medium-haul jet will arrive by spring 2023. https://t.co/xNWe3BQCVN
